summary: A mod to make lighting the world easier with magic.
descriptionHtml:
I intend to make the following tweaks:

• increase radius of candlelight and magelight
• hands with spells equipped emit light
• cast multiple magelight/candlelight spells

I also intend to add some new spells:

• Stronger versions of Candlelight/Magelight
• \"Light Flood\" (works like a flashlight)
author: robotate
